concept.title: AFMC PGI 5317.7601-90 Provisioning

conbody.p: See AFMCMAN 20-106 for guidance on provisioning and use of Provisioned Item Orders (PIOs) in acquiring initial support of USAF aerospace systems and equipment. The instructions apply to the provisioning activity, which processes the orders and contains information for the provisioning contracting officer.
